values.label: Heat sensitive
values.comment: The object is heat sensitive.

values.label: Store in dry environment
values.comment: The object must be stored in dry environment.

values.label: Stacked
values.comment: The identified item is, or can be stacked.

values.label: Mooring to be arranged
values.comment: Request to arrange boatmen to (de)moor the vessel at the berth.

values.label: Mooring arranged
values.comment: Information that the boatmen to (de)moor the vessel at the berth are already arranged.

values.label: Pilotage to be arranged
values.comment: Request to arrange the pilotage for the vessel.

values.label: Pilotage arranged
values.comment: Information that pilotage for the vessel is already arranged.

values.label: Berth towage to be arranged
values.comment: Request to arrange the towage for the vessel to/from the berth in the port.

values.label: Disposal of waste to be arranged
values.comment: Request to arrange the disposal of waste.

values.label: Transshipment to be arranged
values.comment: The consignment has to be transshipped.

values.label: Refrigeration required
values.comment: Item must be refrigerated for proper handling.

values.label: Refrigeration not required
values.comment: Item does not need to be refrigerated for proper handling.

values.label: Destroy
values.comment: The identified goods are to be destroyed according to specified instructions.

values.label: Keep frozen
values.comment: The identified products is frozen and should be kept frozen.

values.label: Hang garment
values.comment: The identified product(s) should be handled as a hanging garment.

values.label: Labelling required
values.comment: The identified product is/are to be labelled.

values.label: Keep in lying position
values.comment: The identified product(s) should be kept in a lying position.

values.label: Move according to instructions
values.comment: The identified product is to be moved according to instructions specified.

values.label: Pack according to instructions
values.comment: The identified product is to be packed according to the instructions provided.

values.label: Prepare for shipment
values.comment: The identified product(s) is(are) to be prepared for shipment.

values.label: Reserve according to instructions
values.comment: Reserve identified goods according to specified instructions.

values.label: Light sensitive
values.comment: The product is sensitive to light.

values.label: Transit or cross docking delivery required
values.comment: The identified product is to be delivered via a transit or cross docking facility.

values.label: Unpacking required
values.comment: The identified product is to be unpacked from the identified package.

values.label: Keep in upright/standing position
values.comment: The identified product should be kept in an upright or standing position.
